title: Blood Stain Child Discography (2002-2014)  (Melodic Metal)
description:
As always please help me keep this torrent alive.I will seed as much as I can. Also please comment if you have a request for discography (and/or album) and I will gladly search for it. And a thank you is always welcome!

Band    : Blood Stain Child
Country : Japan
Genre   : Melodic Death Metal (early), Melodic Death Metal/Trance (later)
